                    double[] filterValues,
                    boolean padding,
                    double padValue)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - Node name.
        inputSize - Input size, necessary to validate the filter and calculate the output size.
        filterValues - The filter.
        padding - A boolean indicating whether padding should be applied.
        padValue - Pad value.
